

```{r}
# Test basic computations
print("Basic Computation Test")
print(2 + 2)  # Should return 4

# Check R version
print("R Version:")
print(R.version.string)

# Test package loading
print("Checking Installed Packages")
if (!require(ggplot2)) {
  install.packages("ggplot2", repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")
}
library(ggplot2)
print("ggplot2 Loaded Successfully")

# Generate a simple plot
print("Generating Test Plot")
x <- seq(0, 10, length.out = 100)
y <- sin(x)

plot(x, y, type = "l", col = "blue", main = "Test Plot", xlab = "X values", ylab = "sin(X)")

print("R Test Completed Successfully!")

```
